mapper.select: select a.id, a.cover, a.title, a.digest, a.is_top, a.is_featured, a.status, a.type, a.create_time, c.name as category_name from article a left join category c on a.category_id = c.id where a.title like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') and is_delete = 0 ORDER BY create_time limit #{pageNum} , #{pageSize}
